channel.title: Bruce Lee on Paris Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Bruce Lee on Paris Personal Blog

item.title: 12 Bruce Lee Quotes that will inspire you to be and do the extraordinary
item.description: We were fortunate enough to have Bruce Lee with us for 32 years. In that time he became arguably the best martial artist in the world.

item.title: The Bruce Lee Method of Change
item.description: Bruce Lee's was wise beyond his years. During his short lived life he tested many theories and dispelled myths about how we live and act.
